title: Demonstrating the power of mid Annie.
body:
Since ranked is going to be disabled for a while, I might as well keep my help my seeding, gain some IP, and get my preseason rank up.

I'm going to be playing a champion I very rarely see mid now a days, mid Annie. I may play Akali if she's not banned, and AP trist if I feel Annie would be a poor choice.

I don't know why, but Annie stomps ridiculously hard in low plat... kinda weird since she has no mobility. I pretty much always go Mejais since they buffed it. If you have having trouble climbing in the low ranks, you should give Annie a try.

My typical general build:
{{item:1056}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3102}} 

I'll also play with who ever, as long as you rank is not low enough to mess up my LP gains.

http://www.twitch.tv/lol_iseestars
